Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xae\x80\xe4\xbd\x93\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Simplified Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xb9\x81\xe9\xab\x94\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Traditional Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (Japanese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 (Korean)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe0\xb9\x84\xe0\xb8\x97\xe0\xb8\xa2 (Thai)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\x91\xd1\x8a\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 (Bulgarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xc4\x8ce\xc5\xa1tina (Czech)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDansk (Danish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDeutsch (German)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\tI agree thanks for fixing it so fast.

Also how about in the next patch u add an effect to the skull on a pole, like fear or something to the race the skull belonged to. It\'s a nice decoration but it would be even better if it did something.\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xae\x80\xe4\xbd\x93\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Simplified Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xb9\x81\xe9\xab\x94\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Traditional Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (Japanese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 (Korean)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe0\xb9\x84\xe0\xb8\x97\xe0\xb8\xa2 (Thai)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\x91\xd1\x8a\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 (Bulgarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xc4\x8ce\xc5\xa1tina (Czech)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDansk (Danish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDeutsch (German)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tJan 17, 2014 @ 12:19am \r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tcreated the game at 94 and merchants are working in all seasons,
while rearranging workshops i had to save and quit, after loading the deconstructed parts where missing\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tJan 21, 2014 @ 5:50am \r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tMerchants comes in winter now but only one at a time. Before 0.9.5 I had 5-6 merchants at a time. Still have lags anf freezes, fps around 2-5, great game but could that be fixed?\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xae\x80\xe4\xbd\x93\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Simplified Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xb9\x81\xe9\xab\x94\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Traditional Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (Japanese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 (Korean)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe0\xb9\x84\xe0\xb8\x97\xe0\xb8\xa2 (Thai)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\x91\xd1\x8a\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 (Bulgarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xc4\x8ce\xc5\xa1tina (Czech)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDansk (Danish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDeutsch (German)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\tGoblins and Ogres now have skulls, nice,.... too bad they are otherwise still boneless jellyfish. Please give us bones from all enemies.\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tDAmn that\'s useful. Able to make a wooden shield and then making stone weapons too along with the added benefit of cutting up Goblins and Ogres to get skulls for shell helms will really help.\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tBe good to get a bone off of goblins so you can start tailoring earlier, but then again after the first year or two you are pretty much drowning in bones, hides and skulls\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\tOh, boy... With the tower shield and Taunt, I can have a squad of professional shielders. And all of them will start training early, thanks to the wooden shields.

And the leader will be called Thorin... Pineshield? :-p
(I already call my first pistol wielder Wolfenstein)

Time to start a new kingdom :-)\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xae\x80\xe4\xbd\x93\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Simplified Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xb9\x81\xe9\xab\x94\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Traditional Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (Japanese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 (Korean)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe0\xb9\x84\xe0\xb8\x97\xe0\xb8\xa2 (Thai)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\x91\xd1\x8a\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 (Bulgarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xc4\x8ce\xc5\xa1tina (Czech)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDansk (Danish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDeutsch (German)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\tJan 14, 2014 @ 11:31am\t\t\t\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\tGnomoria v0.9.5 released\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\tView full event information here:
https://steamcommunity.com/ogg/224500/announcements/detail/1946979352895754169\t
\r\n\t\t

\r\n
\r\n
\r\n \t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tBaleur\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tView Profile\r\n\t\t\t\tView Posts\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tJan 14, 2014 @ 12:06pm \r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tThere is just one thing that i still feel is lacking, that always brings me back to Dwarf Fortress.
I think Gnomoria is great, no doubt about that. But i always miss the combat "physics".
It would be awesome if Gnomoria could introduce something similar, with limbs being flung off and spraying blood over the ground and walls.

I don\'t think it\'s neccessary to go overly detailed on the visual front like seeing the gnomes arm disappear from his sprite (though it would be cool), but just some form of enhanced gibs and combat consequence. Being able to see your kingdom after a horrific battle, seeing strewn bodyparts, skulls and blood painting a picture of how the battle went.

Make it brutal, as a hilarious contrast to the cutesy aesthetic outside of combat :)\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t#1\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\r\n\t\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tBaleur\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tView Profile\r\n\t\t\t\tView Posts\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tJan 14, 2014 @ 12:06pm \r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tThe same blood spray physics could be used to represent fire and smoke in a very cool way, much like in Dwarf Fortress where a dragons fire breath almost is more realistic than in skyrim, due to how with even tile-based graphics, the way fire and smoke can perpetually spread across to neighbouring tiles can create a very cool natural cascade effect.\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t#2\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\r\n\t\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tPiyo\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tView Profile\r\n\t\t\t\tView Posts\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tJan 14, 2014 @ 12:58pm \r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tI know it\'s a bitof an odd thing, but I quite enjoyed dealing with flooding. I\'m wondering if that might come back in as an additional feature, at the moment water seems to evaporate more than refilling... Still realy looking forward to seeing what the diplomacy is like!\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t^ and here I thought floods were a bug. :D
Anyway how are you supposed to "deal" with them?\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tfuzzehpolarbear\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tView Profile\r\n\t\t\t\tView Posts\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tJan 14, 2014 @ 1:12pm \r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tGlad to see the foundations being laid for more complex systems, or glad to see content coming out period really; this is a very entertaining game with what I feel is a whole bucket load of potential, and I hope the updates keep flowing for a long time to come. Too many games like this are abandoned for one reason or another by their creators and it\'s terribly sad to see.

I and some others are having one issue that I don\'t see addressed here though, and that\'s the insanely dangerous dirt golems. I and many others have had our entire civilization essentially wiped out by an angry compost heap. As it is they seem to be completely invulnerable to all blunt damage (can be "injured" but will always be at full health), which is a bit broken\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t#7\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\r\n\t\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tfuzzehpolarbear\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tView Profile\r\n\t\t\t\tView Posts\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\tJan 14, 2014 @ 1:12pm \r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\tconsidering that the most you can generally hope to have by the time you encounter them is your fists and impotent gnomey rage. Maybe change the full immunity into a percentage soak (something like 50-75% of you want to keep it significant), as this is after all a game where underground exploration is encouraged and danger is one thing but basically erecting a massive "nope!" some seven layers below ground level is another thing entirely.

Sure you can torch areas off but it\'s not always enough; sometimes the golems spawn anyway, sometimes you can\'t get torches down there fast enough, and it just seems like a fairly harsh punishment to have what\'s supposed to be a introductory level underground enemy flatten 10+ gnomes because roughly two of them couldn\'t erect torches in time.\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t#8\r\n\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\tthis is just a awesome game, i already played around 300h oO and i still love it. Recommended
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
62.2 hrs on record
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\r\n\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t
Posted: September 23
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFun little sim game. Its not a complex as some, nor does it have all the usability improvements from the last few years, but its a fun little game.\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t

qypea

Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

by cosce

Gnomoria\xe3\x81\xaf\xe3\x83\x97\xe3\x83\xac\xe3\x82\xa4\xe3\x83\xa4\xe3\x83\xbc\xe3\x81\xab\xe8\xa6\x81\xe6\xb1\x82\xe3\x81\x95\xe3\x82\x8c\xe3\x82\x8b\xe7\x9f\xa5\xe8\xad\x98\xe3\x83\xbb\xe6\x93\x8d\xe4\xbd\x9c\xe3\x81\x8c\xe8\xa4\x87\xe9\x9b\x91\xe3\x81\xa7\xe3\x80\x81\xe6\x85\xa3\xe3\x82\x8c\xe3\x82\x8b\xe3\x81\xbe\xe3\x81\xa7\xe3\x81\xab\xe3\x81\x8b\xe3\x81\xaa\xe3\x82\x8a\xe6\x99\x82\xe9\x96\x93\xe3\x81\x8c\xe3\x81\x8b\xe3\x81\x8b\xe3\x82\x8a\xe3\x81\xbe\xe3\x81\x99\xe3\x80\x82\r\n\xe3\x81\x93\xe3\x81\xae\xe3\x82\xac\xe3\x82\xa4\xe3\x83\x89\xe3\x81\xa7\xe3\x81\xaf\xe3\x80\x81\xe3\x81\xa9\xe3\x81\x86\xe3\x81\x84\xe3\x81\x86\xe3\x82\xb2\xe3\x83\xbc\xe3\x83\xa0\xe3\x81\xaa\xe3\x81\xae\xe3\x81\x8b\xe6\x84\x9f\xe8\xa6\x9a\xe3\x82\x92\xe6\x8e\xb4\xe3\x82\x93\xe3\x81\xa7\xe3\x82\x82\xe3\x82\x89\xe3\x81\x86\xe3\x81\x9f\xe3\x82\x81\xe3\x81\xab\xe3\x81\x96\xe3\x81\xa3\xe3\x81\x8f\xe3\x82\x8a\xe6\x9b\xb8\xe3\x81\x8d\xe3\x81\xbe\xe3\x81\x99\xe3\x80\x82\r\n\xe6\x89\x8b\xe6\x8e\xa2\xe3\x82\x8a\xe9\x81\xa0\xe5\x9b\x9e\xe3\x82\x8a\xe6\x99\x82\xe9\x96\x93\xe3\x82\x92\xe3\x81\x8b\xe3\x81\x91\xe3\x81\xa6\xe8\xa6\x9a\xe3\x81\x88\xe3\x81\xa6\xe3\x81\x84\xe3\x81\x8f\xe9\x81\x8e\xe7\xa8\x8b\xe3\x82\x92\xe6\xa5\xbd\xe3\x81\x97\xe3\x81\xbf\xe3\x81\x9f\xe3\x81\x84\xe4\xba\xba\xe5\x90\x91\xe3\x81\x91\xe3\x81\xa7\xe3\x81\xaf\xe3\x81\x82\xe3\x82\x8a\xe3\x81\xbe\xe3\x81\x9b\xe3\x82\x93\xe3\x80\x82\r\n\xe3\x81\xbe\xe3\x81\x9f\xe3\x80\x81\xe5\x90\x84\xe6\x93\x8d\xe4\xbd\x9c\xe7\xad\x89\xe3\x81\xae\xe5\x9f\xba\xe6\x9c\xac\xe7\x9a\x84\xe3\x81\xaa\xe8\xaa\xac\xe6\x98\x8e\xe3\x81\xaf\xe7\x9c\x81\xe3\x81\x8d\xe3\x81\xbe\xe3\x81\x99\xe3\x80\x82wiki\xe3\x82\x82\xe3\x81\x82\xe3\x82\x8b\xe3\x82\x88\xef\xbc\x81\r\n\xe2\x80\xbb\xe6\x9b\xb8\xe3\x81\x8f\xe3\x81\xae\xe3\x82\x81\xe3\x82\x93\xe3\x81\xa9\xe3\x81\x8f\xe3\x81\x95\xe3\x81\x8f\xe3\x81\xaa\xe3\x81\xa3\xe3\x81\x9f\xe3\x81\xae\xe3\x81\xa7\xe6\x9c\xaa\xe5\xae\x8c\xe6\x88\x90\xe3\x81\xa7\xe3\x81\x99\xe3\x81\x8c\xe3\x82\xb9\xe3\x82\xbf\xe3\x83\xbc\xe3\x83\x88\xe3\x82\xa2\xe3\x83\x83\xe3\x83\x97\xe3\x81\xae\xe5\x8f\x82\xe8\x80\x83\xe3\x81\x8f\xe3\x82\x89\xe3\x81\x84\xe3\x81\xab\xe3\x81\xaf\xe3\x81\xaa\xe3\x82\x8b\xe3\x81\xa8\xe6\x80\x9d\xe3\x81\x86\xe3\x81\xae\xe3\x81\xa7\xe5\x85\xac\xe9\x96\x8b\xe3\x81\x97\xe3\x81\xbe\xe3\x81\x99\xe3\x80\x82...

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tGuide to Gnomish Warfare\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
by Tdog101
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
Is your fort getting over run by goblins? Are mants stealing all of your food? Do you want to learn how to protect your gnomish fort? If you answered "Yes" to any of these questions, read this guide and learn the art of gnomish warfare!...
\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tYour First Spring: A Gnomoria Guide For New Gnoministrators\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
by emazo
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
This is a guide for new gnoministrators, who are taking their first steps into building a new kingdom. This guide is intended to show you how to play the game, and take you through your first season, to your first gnomad arrival, and your merchant visit on...
\r\n\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tGnomoria Basics - Beginner\'s Guide\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
by G\'lek
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
This guide will take you through how to play Gnomoria. It will start by guiding you through the menus and what they all mean. Then it will take you through setting up your first Kingdom. It will assume you are playing on Peaceful just to help you get start...
\r\n\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
by VIGA

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHow to safely mine!\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
by AntiAnecdote
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
I take it a lot of people are having trouble with zombies and skeletons spawning in their map so i decided to make this guide to help reduce that problem, the reason i found this out is by dieing from skeletons and zombies more than a few times.\r\n\r\nThanks ...
\r\n\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMiscellaneous Tips (Things you don\'t often stumble upon in other guides)\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
by Rhadamant
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t[\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87\xe6\x8c\x87\xe5\x8d\x97]\xe7\x9f\xae\xe4\xba\xba\xe6\x9d\x91\xe5\xba\x84\xe6\x96\xb0\xe6\x89\x8b\xe5\x85\xa5\xe9\x97\xa8<\xe5\x8f\x82\xe8\x80\x83\xe7\xbf\xbb\xe8\xaf\x91>\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
by Attack.On.Pika[AFK]
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
\xe6\xac\xa2\xe8\xbf\x8e \r\n\r\n\xe6\xac\xa2\xe8\xbf\x8e\xe6\x82\xa8\xe7\x9a\x84\xe5\x88\xb0\xe6\x9d\xa5\xe3\x80\x82\xe5\xbd\x93\xe4\xbd\xa0\xe5\x87\x86\xe5\xa4\x87\xe5\xbc\x80\xe5\xa7\x8b\xe6\xb8\xb8\xe7\x8e\xa9Gnomoria\xef\xbc\x88\xe7\x9f\xae\xe4\xba\xba\xe6\x9d\x91\xe5\xba\x84\xef\xbc\x89\xe6\x97\xb6\xef\xbc\x8c\xe4\xbd\xa0\xe6\x98\xaf\xe5\x90\xa6\xe5\x9b\xa0\xe4\xb8\xba\xe8\xaf\xad\xe8\xa8\x80\xe9\x97\xae\xe9\xa2\x98\xe6\x88\x96\xe6\x98\xaf\xe5\xa4\xaa\xe5\xa4\x9a\xe7\x9a\x84\xe6\xb8\xb8\xe6\x88\x8f\xe7\xbb\x86\xe8\x8a\x82\xe8\x80\x8c\xe6\x99\x95\xe5\xa4\xb4\xe8\xbd\xac\xe5\x90\x91\xef\xbc\x8c\xe4\xb8\x8d\xe7\x9f\xa5\xe6\x89\x80\xe4\xbb\xa5\xef\xbc\x9f\xe9\x82\xa3\xe4\xb9\x88\xef\xbc\x8c\xe8\xbf\x99\xe7\xaf\x87\xe8\xaf\x84\xe6\xb5\x8b\xe5\xb0\x86\xe6\x95\x99\xe4\xbc\x9a\xe4\xbd\xa0\xe4\xb8\x80\xe6\xad\xa5\xe4\xb8\x80\xe6\xad\xa5\xe7\x8e\xa9\xe4\xbc\x9a\xe8\xbf\x99\xe6\xac\xbe\xe6\xb8\xb8\xe6\x88\x8f\xe3\x80\x82\r\n\r\n\xe9\xa6\x96\xe5\x85\x88\xef\xbc\x8c\xe8\xa6\x81\xe6\x98\x8e\xe7\xa1\xae\xe4\xb8\x80\xe7\x82\xb9\xef\xbc\x8c\xe6\xad\xa3\xe5\xa6\x82\xe5\xa4\xa7\xe9\x83\xa8\xe5\x88\x86DF\xef\xbc\x88\xe7\x9f\xae\xe4\xba\xba\xe8\xa6\x81\xe5\xa1\x9e\xef\xbc\x89\xe6\xb8\xb8\xe6\x88\x8f\xe4\xb8\x80\xe6\xa0\xb7\xef\xbc\x8c\xe8\xbf\x99\xe6\x98\xaf\xe4\xb8\x80\xe6\xac\xbe\xe2\x80\x9c\xe5\x9f\x8e\xe5\xa0\xa1\xe5\xbb\xba\xe8\xae\xbe\xe2\x80\x9d\xe6\xb8\xb8\xe6\x88\x8f\xef\xbc\x8c\xe4\xbd\xa0\xe6\x89\x80\xe9\x9c\x80\xe8\xa6\x81\xe5\x81\x9a\xe7\x9a\x84\xe5\x8f\xaa\xe6\x98\xaf\xe7\xbb\x99\xe5\x87\xba\xe5\x85\xb7\xe4\xbd\x93\xe7\x9a\x84\xe8\xa7\x84\xe5\x88\x92\xef\xbc\x8c\xe7\x84\xb6\xe5\x90\x8e\xe4\xbd\xa0\xe7\x9a\x84\xe7\x9f\xae\xe4\xba\xba\xef\xbc\x88Gnomes\xef\xbc\x89\xe5\xb0\x86\xe4\xbc\x9a\xe8\x87\xaa\xe5\x8a\xa8\xe8\x87\xaa\xe8\xa1\x8c\xef\xbc\x8c\xe8\x80\x8c\xe4\xb8\x8d\xe5\x83\x8f\xe4\xbc\xa0\xe7\xbb\x9f\xe5\x8d\xb3\xe4\xbd\xbf\xe6\x88\x98\xe7\x95\xa5\xe6\xb8\xb8\xe6\x88\x8f\xe4\xb8\x80\xe6\xa0\xb7\xe4\xbd\xa0\xe9\x9c\x80\xe8\xa6\x81\xe6\x89\x8b\xe5\x8a\xa8\xe6\x93\x8d\xe4\xbd\x9c\xe6\xaf\x8f\xe4\xb8\xaa\xe5\x8d\x95\xe4\xbd\x8d\xe3\x80\x82\xe5\x90\x8c\xe6\x97\xb6\xef\xbc\x8c\xe4\xbd\xa0\xe7\x9a\x84\xe7\x9f\xae\xe4\xba\xba\xe4\xbb\xac\xe4\xb9\x9f\xe6\x9c\x89\xe8\x87\xaa\xe5\xb7\xb1\xe7\x9a\x84\xe4\xbd\x9c\xe6\x81\xaf\xe5\x8f\x8a\xe7\x94\x9f\xe7\x90\x86\xe9\x9c\x80\xe6\xb1\x82\xef\xbc\x8c\xe4\xbb\x96\xe4\xbb\xac\xe4\xbc\x9a\xe4\xbc\x98\xe5\x85\x88\xe6\xbb\xa1\xe8\xb6\xb3\xe8\x87\xaa\xe5\xb7\xb1\xe7\x9a\x84\xe7\x94\x9f\xe7\x90\x86\xe9\x9c\x80\xe6\xb1\x82\xef\xbc\x8c\xe4\xb9\x8b\xe5\x90\x8e\xe6\x89\x8d\xe4\xbc\x9a\xe6\x8c\x89\xe8\xa7\x84\xe5\xae\x9a\xe7\x9a\x84\xe8\xae\xa1\xe5\x88\x92\xe5\xb9\xb2\xe6\xb4\xbb\xe3\x80\x82\r\n\r\n...

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSurviving Year One for Beginners\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
by Ked
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
A beginner\'s guide for Gnomoria, with helpful tips and stategies for getting through the first year....

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEasy Early Underground Farm\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
by Caiburn
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
How to farm underground early and without danger. \r\nInspired by dwarven farming methods.\r\n...

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xae\x80\xe4\xbd\x93\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Simplified Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xb9\x81\xe9\xab\x94\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Traditional Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (Japanese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 (Korean)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe0\xb9\x84\xe0\xb8\x97\xe0\xb8\xa2 (Thai)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\x91\xd1\x8a\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 (Bulgarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xc4\x8ce\xc5\xa1tina (Czech)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDansk (Danish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDeutsch (German)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Gnomoria v1.0 released!
\r\n\t\t
Feb 23, 2016
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
This release marks Gnomoria\'s transition out of Early Access! This update adds a ton of quality of life changes, additional support for mod developers, a debug mode for testing and spawning items and gnomes, optimizations and tons of bug fixes.

Check out the full patch notes here[forums.gnomoria.com].

Gnomoria Defies Name By Leaving Early Access
\r\n\t\t
Feb 25, 2016
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t

Gnomoria [official site] is a sandbox village management ‘em up that tasks you with helping a group of outcast gnomes on their way to building a kingdom/gnome utopia. After a few years in Early Access, and a few years development prior to that, it’s now launched itself into full release and I surely can’t get to the end of this intro paragraph without mentioning its spectacularly puntastic name. Lovely.

… [visit site to read more]

\r\n\t\t
Now Available on Steam - Gnomoria
\r\n\t\t
Feb 23, 2016
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
After a successful Early Access,Gnomoria is now released on Steam!

Gnomoria is a sandbox village management game where you help lead a small group of gnomes, who have set out on their own, to thrive into a bustling kingdom! Anything you see can be broken down and rebuilt elsewhere. Craft items, build structures, set traps and dig deep underground in search of precious resources to help your gnomes survive the harsh lands. Build your kingdom and stockpile wealth to attract wandering gnomads to your cause, but be wary of also attracting enemies!


\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
Product Release
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t
1
\r\n\t\t\t\t
1
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n
\r\n
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
v0.9.18 released!
\r\n\t\t
Oct 2, 2015
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
Mod Support!

For a complete list of changes check out the changelog on indev[forums.gnomoria.com].

To use a mod, either subscribe to it on Steam Workshop or copy the mod to your Mods folder where Gnomoria is installed. When starting a new game, select Advanced Options and choose the mod.

To create a mod, copy the "Mod Files" folder into the "Mods" folder and rename it. To set the name and description for your mod, create a text file and name it settings.ini. Add "Name = " without quotes followed by the mod name and on a separate line "Description = " followed by your mod description.

To upload your mod to Steam Workshop, create a folder in the Steam Workshop folder and name it whatever you want. Copy your mod into that new folder and rename it to "Mod Files". To add a preview image when viewing this mod in the Workshop, add an image file named preview.png. Launch Gnomoria, select Steam Workshop and then the mod you wish to add or update.

When creating mods, each file is documented at the top explaining how to edit that file. New images are added to the Sprites folder and can be combined or separate files. Missing files will load the vanilla equivalent. To combine multiple mods, create a folder in your mod folder and name it "Included Mods". This folder should be next to the Data and Sprites folder. Copy the mod you want to include into that new folder. Create a text file called modmergeorder.ini and list the mods in the order you want them to be added. Mods will merge together with mods that loaded first having priority.
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t

Gnomoria now available for OSX and linux!
\r\n\t\t
Jul 23, 2015
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
The latest stable build of Gnomoria is now available on both OSX and linux platforms. The current indev build of Gnomoria is well into mod support and still has a little ways to go before making it\'s way to the stable branch. Indev right now is Windows only but will be available for OSX and linux soon.
\r\n\t\t

Gnomoria v0.9.17
\r\n\t\t
Feb 18, 2015
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
General
  • Added automatons
    • Researched after prosthetic limbs
    • Crafted at Engineer Shop
    • Requires a golem core to craft. Golem cores have a chance of spawning when golems are killed
    • Body part materials are determined by the materials of components used
    • Can be repaired at an Engineer Shop using armor plates
    • Die when core or fuel tank is destroyed in combat
    • Automatons dismantle on death. If the core is still intact it can be used to recraft the automaton with a penalty to skills
    • Can perform jobs and be on squads
    • Can\'t equip weapons or armor
    • Requires coal to run. Gnomes will add coal when empty otherwise automatons refuel themselves. They don\'t eat/drink/sleep\t

  • Reduced minimum stocks before golems spawn from 1000 to 500 (250 for bars)
  • Added straw to golem spawns (wheat golems)
  • Added manual population cap setting to population overview. A value of 0 has no cap (the default is no cap)
  • Some resources are consumed when creating a golem core. Dirt, clay and stone golems will generate metal slivers, similar to prospecting, if no golem core is created
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
Gnomoria
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
69
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t
47
\r\n\t\t

Gnomoria v0.9.16
\r\n\t\t
Nov 11, 2014
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
General
  • Added prosthetic limbs
    • Discovered through Tinkering, crafted at Engineer Shop and installed in a Hospital
    • Armor can\'t be worn over prosthetic limbs
    • Can be viewed through the character equipment tab and set to be removed
    • Can be smelted\t
Fixed
  • A couple pixels on the scaffolding sprite
  • Deconstructing a floor that was built as part of a Build Wall job causing the construction component to become unusable
  • Items that can be piled repeatedly being restocked when in piles of 1
  • Quivers and ammo pouches that aren\'t empty halting stockpiles
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
Gnomoria
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t

Gnomoria v0.9.15
\r\n\t\t
Oct 7, 2014
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
General
  • Stockpile UI is now resizable. Size and position are preserved across play sessions like other resizable windows
  • Added a restock threshold setting to each stockpile
    • Stockpile automatically suspends itself when full and unsuspends when there are the same or more number of spaces available as the threshold
    • Manually turning suspend on or off will override any automated behavior\t
  • Gnomes now use items that can be piled (dirt, stone, straw, etc) to pick up similar items while stocking
  • Added an option on the Smelter to automatically smelt worn items
Fixed
  • Visual artifacts with some sprites

This update has been crazy! If you haven\'t seen the indev board on the official forums, I ran into a ton of bugs getting dirt, etc to act like wheelbarrows. Some bugs might have been old but the majority were new, so I left them out of the changelist going from 0.9.14 to 0.9.15. This has been the longest patch in Gnomoria\'s history and took much longer than I or anyone could have guessed. I\'ll still be working on bugs along the way but it will be nice to start working on some other areas of the game again :)

Also, I wanna say thanks to everyone who\'s been testing out the changes on the indev branch. It\'s been a huge help, you guys are awesome!
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t

Gnomoria
\r\n\t
\r\n\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t
Gnomoria v0.9.14
\r\n\t\t
Jul 18, 2014
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
General
  • Added silica - Obtained through prospecting in addition to slivers
  • Added ceramic tile - Crafted at a Kiln with clay, silica and coal
  • Changed Ceramic Wall recipe to use ceramic tile. The wall value is now 20 instead of 0.
  • Added game.ini to install directory
    • Has "savefolder" parameter to specify the directory for save games as well as settings.ini
    • If game.ini is missing or the savefolder parameter is empty/invalid it will default to the original directory (Documents/My Games/Gnomoria)
    • Some paths will require Gnomoria to be run as administrator to have write access\t
  • Stocked goods can be transferred from one stockpile to another
    • Added Transfer tab to stockpile UI
    • Each stockpile can "push" and "pull" goods to another stockpile. This still allows for many stockpiles to push to the same one
    • Stockpiles that push to another one are listed in the other stockpiles UI as well as their own.
    • Stockpiles are still worked in priority order. When stocking a given stockpile, gnomes will first attempt to pull goods from other stockpiles before stocking unstocked goods\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
Gnomoria
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
57
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t
20
\r\n\t\t

Gnomoria v0.9.13
\r\n\t\t
Jun 24, 2014
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
General
  • Golem spawns now based off amount of unstocked goods instead of darkness
  • Golems can spawn from soil, raw stone, raw ore, logs, blocks, bars and planks
  • Items convert into a golem and revert back into items on golem death
  • Added new wall and floor types to build with
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
Gnomoria
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
203
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t
36
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n
\r\n
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
Gnomoria v0.9.12
\r\n\t\t
May 27, 2014
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
General
  • Reduced mant aggro range to keep them focused on stealing food.
  • Increased the minimum food + drink before mants start spawning
  • Adjusted mant spawns so that lower food/drink stocks attract fewer mants than before while also higher stocks attract more mants than before
  • Added buckets and sacks. Used for hauling goods similar to wheelbarrows but for items that store in barrels and bags.
  • Changed grove and farm behavior so that higher priority groves/farms will be worked before lower priority. Previously they first went in job order (Harvest, etc) and then in priority order within the same job type.
  • Increased skill gains from Prospecting
  • Added lead slivers to prospecting stone
  • Chance of successful prospecting now increases with Prospecting skill
  • Added an additional property so that objects of the same material can have different sustain values
    • Increased sustain for doors and golems
    • Decreased sustain for leather armor
Fixed
  • Crash when a zombie rises while on a set trap
  • When stocking with wheelbarrows, items sometimes getting in an invalid state where they were simultaneously inside and not inside a crate.
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
Gnomoria
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
33
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t
15
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n
\r\n
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
Gnomoria v0.9.11 released
\r\n\t\t
May 13, 2014
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
General
  • Mant workers now prioritize stealing food and will leave if enough food has been stolen
  • Mants now spawn solely off food and drink stocks and are uneffected by Kingdom Worth
  • "Craft To" setting on Prospector now prospects down to that stock level as expected
  • Added "Smelt To" setting on Smelter which will continue to smelt items until the stock levels are at or below the setting value
  • Adjusted training grounds skill ups so that while sparring gnomes gain skill in their equipped weapons as well as the weapons used by their sparring partner. Spectators now also gain skill in their equipped weapon and not just that of the gnomes sparring
Fixed
  • Fixed unusable items left from deconstructing stairs and wall in previous saves. (Might cause longer load times the first load)
  • Initiating a tribute or insult and then backing out and selecting the other option has invalid items in the offer
  • Crash trying to dig stairs down at the bottom of the map over lava
  • Crash clicking on "En Route" from population or gnome UI window
  • Crash typing in a trade quantity when no trade item is selected
  • Crash when loading certain saves that caused it to stay on the load screen indefinitely
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
Gnomoria
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
49
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t
19
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n
\r\n
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
Gnomoria Updated
\r\n\t\t
Aug 6, 2013
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
Fixed
\xe2\x80\xa2\tA couple instances in the behavior tree where a gnome tried to do work on a job with a wheelbarrow after it had been canceled, resulting in a crash
\xe2\x80\xa2\tCrash on load with the personal quarters
\xe2\x80\xa2\tGnomes stocking items into a wheelbarrow that was in a stockpile
\xe2\x80\xa2\tWheelbarrows not becoming unclaimed if the job was canceled before a gnome picked it up
\xe2\x80\xa2\tResource piles (dirt, raw stone, etc) and corpses displaying as the wrong item while held
\xe2\x80\xa2\tWheelbarrows and troughs not being listed in stockpile options or when viewing all items
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
Product Update
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t
6
\r\n\t\t\t\t
1
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n
\r\n
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
Gnomoria Updated
\r\n\t\t
Jul 23, 2013
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
General
  • Added an attack tab to the enemy window
    • Individual squads can be set to attack an enemy
    • Squads with "Defend gnomes" selected will automatically be set to attack
    • Attacks can be canceled by unchecking squads
    • Squads without "Defend gnomes" or "Perform attack orders" will not be shown in the list
  • Removed the attack button from the enemy window
  • Added an Enemies tab to Military overview
    • Lists all spotted enemies
    • Squads can be assigned to attack enemies
    • Option to view the selected enemy
  • Added option to retreat from combat to equip missing gear
  • Added option to retreat from combat to refill ammo
    • Gnomes will only retreat once they have no ammo but will attempt to refill all ammo before going back to combat
Fixed
  • Gnomes continuing to pursue enemies after they died
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
Product Update
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t
6
\r\n\t\t\t\t
0
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n
\r\n
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
Gnomoria Updated
\r\n\t\t
Jul 16, 2013
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
General
\xe2\x80\xa2\tWhen deciding what to eat/drink, gnomes account for nourishment value of food/drink along with distance.
\xe2\x80\xa2\tAdded Gameplay option to adjust how much food/drink nourishment effects a gnome\'s decision. Moving the slider to 0 will cause gnomes to always pick the closest food/drink. When multiple options are equidistant, they will choose the best. Moving the slider to 100 will allow gnomes to travel much farther for the best food/drink. Default is 50.
\xe2\x80\xa2\tAllow grass to grow up or down 1 level
\xe2\x80\xa2\tGnomes no longer try to maintain distance from squad members while training
Fixed
\xe2\x80\xa2\tCrash when completing Fill Hole and items are inside the hole.
\xe2\x80\xa2\tPerformance issue with lots of unreachable jobs
\xe2\x80\xa2\tSometimes falling down a 1 tile deep hole and immediately moving back out, ie enemies falling down a hatch and immediately teleporting back up to the top
\xe2\x80\xa2\tLiquids not updating properly when a tile is dug down that has liquid on it
\xe2\x80\xa2\tRamps not properly being if trees or constructions were diagonally adjacent. This left invisible ramps causing tiles to not accept constructions, designations, etc.
\xe2\x80\xa2\tTinker Benches not respecting assigned worker
\xe2\x80\xa2\tBeing able to replace the floor underneath a sapling
\xe2\x80\xa2\tFood/drink HUD text not initializing red when a game is loaded with 0 food or drink
\xe2\x80\xa2\tDisplaying a negative amount of gnomads arriving. Now it correctly displays 0
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
Product Update
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t
6
\r\n\t\t\t\t
0
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n
\r\n
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
Gnomoria Updated
\r\n\t\t
Jul 9, 2013
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
General
\xe2\x80\xa2\tAdded gameplay option to pause and move the camera to new gnomads on arrival

Fixed
\xe2\x80\xa2\tCrash with Training Grounds when loading
\xe2\x80\xa2\tCrash when moving a job type down in the priority list causing a custom profession to be created
\xe2\x80\xa2\tCrash exporting military/profession settings with illegal filename characters
\xe2\x80\xa2\tGame potentially freezes when completing some jobs
\xe2\x80\xa2\tGnomes trying to use the same bed and sleeping on the floor
\xe2\x80\xa2\tWindmills not properly turning on/off when it changes to outside/inside
\xe2\x80\xa2\tGnomes sometimes not pasturing livestock if an unreachable animal exists
\xe2\x80\xa2\tSeveral cases of inside/outside status of tiles not properly updating
\xe2\x80\xa2\tScout perk increasing vision more than intended
\xe2\x80\xa2\tBone Shirt and Skull Helmet not storing in crates
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
Product Update
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t
3
\r\n\t\t\t\t
0
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n
\r\n
\r\n\t
\r\n\t\t
Gnomoria Updated
\r\n\t\t
Jul 2, 2013
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t
General
  • Gnomes now eat/drink until full instead of eating until no longer starving or dying of thirst
  • Gnomes will now look for the closest food/drink instead of the best followed by the closest
  • Underground farm

    • Requires plots to be muddied with water before planting
    • Mud will dry out in sunlight but otherwise remains

  • Added mushrooms which can be grown in an underground farm
  • Merchants now stock mushroom seeds
  • Added Grove and Underground Farm to action bar
  • Added cheese, mushroom tea and various omelettes
  • Food and drink quantities on the HUD turn red when 0

Fixed
  • Gnomes kicking each other out of chairs in the great hall
  • Regular plants growing underground
  • Gnomes not starting the Remove Floor job if they are standing on the job site and can\'t path to an adjacent tile
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t
\r\n\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xae\x80\xe4\xbd\x93\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Simplified Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xb9\x81\xe9\xab\x94\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Traditional Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (Japanese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 (Korean)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe0\xb9\x84\xe0\xb8\x97\xe0\xb8\xa2 (Thai)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\x91\xd1\x8a\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 (Bulgarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xc4\x8ce\xc5\xa1tina (Czech)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDansk (Danish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDeutsch (German)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Find and install new mods for Gnomoria. Just subscribe and then select the mod when starting a new game.

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xae\x80\xe4\xbd\x93\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Simplified Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xb9\x81\xe9\xab\x94\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Traditional Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (Japanese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 (Korean)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe0\xb9\x84\xe0\xb8\x97\xe0\xb8\xa2 (Thai)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\x91\xd1\x8a\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 (Bulgarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xc4\x8ce\xc5\xa1tina (Czech)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDansk (Danish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDeutsch (German)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xae\x80\xe4\xbd\x93\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Simplified Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xb9\x81\xe9\xab\x94\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Traditional Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (Japanese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 (Korean)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe0\xb9\x84\xe0\xb8\x97\xe0\xb8\xa2 (Thai)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\x91\xd1\x8a\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 (Bulgarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xc4\x8ce\xc5\xa1tina (Czech)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDansk (Danish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDeutsch (German)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xae\x80\xe4\xbd\x93\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Simplified Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xb9\x81\xe9\xab\x94\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Traditional Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (Japanese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 (Korean)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe0\xb9\x84\xe0\xb8\x97\xe0\xb8\xa2 (Thai)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\x91\xd1\x8a\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 (Bulgarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xc4\x8ce\xc5\xa1tina (Czech)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDansk (Danish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDeutsch (German)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tGuide to Gnomish Warfare\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
by Tdog101
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
Is your fort getting over run by goblins? Are mants stealing all of your food? Do you want to learn how to protect your gnomish fort? If you answered "Yes" to any of these questions, read this guide and learn the art of gnomish warfare!...
\r\n\t\t\t\t

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHow to get max gnomads every month!\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
by Donskelly
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
This is a guide on how to get the maximum number of gnomads every month!...

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tThe most dangerous thing to beware in Gnomoria: The Honey Badger\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
by Luthy
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
Do you have the deadliest enemy invading your base without you knowing? Find out here!...

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
by Fu
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
This will explain how to modify your gnomes with the software ArtMoney....

Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Gnomoria

Gnomoria

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\tStore Page\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

Browse and rate player-created guides for this game. Or create your own and share your tips with the community.

\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xae\x80\xe4\xbd\x93\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Simplified Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xb9\x81\xe9\xab\x94\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Traditional Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (Japanese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 (Korean)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe0\xb9\x84\xe0\xb8\x97\xe0\xb8\xa2 (Thai)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\x91\xd1\x8a\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 (Bulgarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xc4\x8ce\xc5\xa1tina (Czech)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDansk (Danish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDeutsch (German)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t

\r\n\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\tInstall Steam\t\t\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tlogin\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t | \r\n\t\t\t\t\t\tlanguage\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xae\x80\xe4\xbd\x93\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Simplified Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe7\xb9\x81\xe9\xab\x94\xe4\xb8\xad\xe6\x96\x87 (Traditional Chinese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe6\x97\xa5\xe6\x9c\xac\xe8\xaa\x9e (Japanese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xed\x95\x9c\xea\xb5\xad\xec\x96\xb4 (Korean)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xe0\xb9\x84\xe0\xb8\x97\xe0\xb8\xa2 (Thai)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\x91\xd1\x8a\xd0\xbb\xd0\xb3\xd0\xb0\xd1\x80\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8 (Bulgarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xc4\x8ce\xc5\xa1tina (Czech)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDansk (Danish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tDeutsch (German)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Espa\xc3\xb1a (Spanish - Spain)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tEspa\xc3\xb1ol - Latinoam\xc3\xa9rica (Spanish - Latin America)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xce\x95\xce\xbb\xce\xbb\xce\xb7\xce\xbd\xce\xb9\xce\xba\xce\xac (Greek)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tFran\xc3\xa7ais (French)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tItaliano (Italian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tMagyar (Hungarian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNederlands (Dutch)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tNorsk (Norwegian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPolski (Polish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas (Portuguese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tPortugu\xc3\xaas - Brasil (Portuguese - Brazil)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tRom\xc3\xa2n\xc4\x83 (Romanian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa0\xd1\x83\xd1\x81\xd1\x81\xd0\xba\xd0\xb8\xd0\xb9 (Russian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSuomi (Finnish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tSvenska (Swedish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tT\xc3\xbcrk\xc3\xa7e (Turkish)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tTi\xe1\xba\xbfng Vi\xe1\xbb\x87t (Vietnamese)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\xd0\xa3\xd0\xba\xd1\x80\xd0\xb0\xd1\x97\xd0\xbd\xd1\x81\xd1\x8c\xd0\xba\xd0\xb0 (Ukrainian)\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\tHelp us translate Steam\r\n\t\t\t\t\t\t\t
